summary: The docling.models package implements a collection of model classes that encapsulate the core processing steps required to transform scanned document images into structured, machine‑readable representations. It includes abstract base models, OCR engines (EasyOCR, Tesseract), layout and table structure predictors, preprocessing utilities, and assemblers that combine raw conversion outputs into coherent page objects with normalized text, figures and tables.
business_intent: Provide a reusable, plug‑in architecture for automated document digitization, enabling enterprises to extract, organize and analyze textual and tabular information from heterogeneous document sources without manual data entry.
